pages.title: Reagent Conduits
pages.text: <item>Resonating Filters/$ are an expensive but 'easy' way to filter out mixtures of <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$. They are rarely required- mixed <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ can usually be separated as items or by taking advantage of different boiling points ($(l:essentials:alchemy/conduit)gasses won't naturally flow down, and liquids and solids won't go up/$).$(br2)

The <item>resonating filter/$ has a UI with a single slot for $(l:essentials:alchemy/glassware)<item>glassware/$; any types of <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ in the $(l:essentials:alchemy/glassware)<item>glassware/$ are 'matched' by the filter. <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)Reagents/$ are accepted in the top, and <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ that match the filter will be transferred out the side, while <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ that don't match are transferred out the bottom into a connected <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/conduit)conduit/$ or other alchemy container.$(br2)
